column4: hello! Everytime I'm trying to install something ubuntu asks me for new things, and I don't have an internet connection. I'm writting the programs in a CD, go home, try to install them, aaaand errors! do you know where I can get a huge packet or what should I do?
try debian, download 3 DVD (or 9 CDs), then, you have all you need
you hit a very good example how ubuntu took debian, and make it worse
